content:
XmlSchemaUse Enum

Definition

Indicator of how the attribute is used.

In this Article

public enum XmlSchemaUse
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
XmlSchemaUse

Remarks

Optional.

Fields

None

Attribute use not specified.
Optional

Attribute is optional.
Prohibited

Attribute cannot be used.
Required

Attribute must appear once.
